attributes.action: introduce tougher penalties for vandals and legislate to stop further destruction of public property
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE CASE OF THE CONGLETON ANARCHISTS SHOW HOW SELFISH THOSE WHO VANDALISE PUBLIC PROPERTY ARE - WITH NO RESPECT FOR ARCHITECTURE, PUBLIC PROPERTY OR AESTHETICS - SHALL WE ALL COME ROUND AND DAUB PAINT ON YOUR HOUSE ????

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
